required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Mi-thos® Transcatheter Mitral Valve Replacement Study
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Efficacy and Safety of the Mi-thos® Transcatheter Mitral Valve Replacement System in Patients With Severe Mitral Valve Disease at High Surgical Risk.

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the safety and performance of the Mi-thos® Mitral Heart Valve with the Mi-thos® Transcatheter Delivery System.

detailed_description.textblock: The Mi-thos® study is an multicenter, single-arm, prospective, safety and performance clinical study.

secondary_outcome.description: Severe adverse events rate after TMVR
NYHA Heart Function Rating after TMVR
Kansas City Cardiomyopathy score after TMVR

arm_group.description: Transcatheter mitral valve replacement with the Mi-thos® valve and transcatheter delivery system

intervention.intervention_name: Mi-thos® valve and transapical delivery system
